I have already suggested Kerbal pushiest with accelerometers.  They would make happy noises when thrown around.  

NOW I'd like to suggest a line of Kerbal toys that the happy acceleration plushies could ride!  Imagine KSP themed rockets, cars, planes and other things for your Kerbal plushies to ride!
I think it'd be cool if the plushies just had a "Max G" readout on the front! How much acceleration has *your* plushie experienced? With an associated online gallery of records of course

Ooh!  That's a cool idea!

Plushies in free fall (less than .5 g) = laughing, giggling sounds.

Plushies under acceleration ( 1.5 - 4g) = groaning, grunting sounds

Plushies st impact (excess of 10 momentary g) = screams and ouch noises
Funny, but maybe a bit too funny.

There could be a "serious mode" where instead of giggles and screams, it plays a mixture of quotes from various scientific personalities, Sagan, Hawking, DeGrasse, Moore etc

*SMACK* "For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled."

*BANG* "If you want to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first create the universe."
